objects.text:
• High-quality stainless steel construction
• Classic maritime design with rope detail
• Water-resistant and built to last
• Perfect for everyday wear or occasions

product_details.name: Premium Nautical Anchor Pendant - Elegant Maritime Statement Necklace
product_details.description:
• ✨ High-quality stainless steel construction - Tarnish and rust-resistant
• ⚓ Classic maritime anchor design with sophisticated rope detail
• 📏 Perfect size pendant for everyday wear or special occasions
• ⛓️ Durable box chain included - Secure and stylish
• ✅ High-polish mirror finish for lasting brilliance
• 🎁 Ideal gift for sailors, naval enthusiasts, or maritime fashion lovers
• 💪 Water-resistant and built to last
• 🏷️ Unisex design suitable for all styles
• 🔨 Expertly crafted with attention to detail
• 📦 Comes in elegant gift packaging

banner_details:
The banner presents a clean and modern product advertisement for a jewelry item. It is divided diagonally into two contrasting backgrounds: a deep navy gradient and a soft blue-gray gradient, creating a stylish and elegant contrast. The top left features two large, bold title text layers (`heading_1` and `heading_2`), centered vertically and aligned to the left. Below them is a subheading (`subheading`) in a lighter blue, followed by a thin horizontal line (`decorative`) for separation. The product details are presented in bullet points (`description`) for clarity. A bold price tag (`price`) stands out prominently, and the banner concludes with a distinct call-to-action button (`cta_button`) labeled by `cta`. The top-right contains a product image (`product_image`), partially overlapping the divided backgrounds.

**Color Palette:**
- Navy Blue: #0d2842
- Deep Blue: #0a1c30
- Light Steel Blue: #d8e0e8
- Sky Blue: #b0c4d8
- Text Light: #e0e8f0
- Accent Blue: #90b0d0
- CTA Text: #0d2842
- White: #ffffff
product_color: The product image features a sleek silver anchor pendant on a polished chain, set against a deep black satin background. The primary colors are metallic silver (#C0C0C0) and jet black (#000000), which together create a luxurious contrast. The metallic shine is enhanced by gradients of light gray (#D3D3D3) and subtle reflections of white (#FFFFFF), giving the pendant a highly polished, three-dimensional look. The black background blends softly with grays, adding depth while allowing the silver to pop dramatically. This monochrome palette communicates elegance and sophistication—ideal for an advertisement that aims to highlight luxury and precision craftsmanship.
